TopicTitle: Rate the signature of the user above you

Articles.Content: 4/10 for stretched image from a game I\'ve never played.
8/10 Because its funny.

Two

Self-depreciation is one thing, your sig is another.

0/10.

Ponies. Yuck.

0/10 for criticisizing ponies!

7/10 for quotes.

> 
> 0/10 for criticisizing ponies!
> 
> 7/10 for quotes.

OOG: What do you mean, I have a signature.

It leads to the greatest thread in RP history.
0/10 for the thread being deleted due to the deletion of the RP forums as a whole.
7/10 for good quoting. -3 for not being author.
10/10 for Haruhi Suzumia and steam.

Five

> 
> 7/10 for good quoting. -3 for not being author.

 ??? Quoting yourself is tacky. ???
6/10 for slight apptity and a strange forum excerpt.

I disapprove of this thread.

You copied me.

WHY?

Also 1/10, I hate pie.

Four.

Too tall, misspelling I don\'t get it.
8/10 for possible future Kerbal Space Program creature

10/10

I love following not-paths.
8/10 I do everything the hard way.

Kerbal/Kerbal

or seven.
10/10 Epic gif

9/10 MMMM apple pie!
10/10 for the truth.
10/10 Epic proportions has been Chuck Norrised
1/10 because of \'your\' instead of you\'re. Believe it or not, stuff like that really does bother me.
